properties.name: Mount Perster
properties.legend: Erupting volcano. Height: 2113922820157210600 m.

properties.name: Merlowbig Purifying Well
properties.legend: This legendary water source is whispered about in ancient tales and believed to possess mystical properties. The spring emanates crystal-clear water, shimmering with an otherworldly iridescence that sparkles even in the dimmest light.

properties.name: Sunterev Pinery
properties.legend: A pinery sacred to local Turchian Spirits.

properties.name: Nosmouthel Effigy
properties.legend:
An ancient effigy. It has an inscription, but no one can translate it:
༤༊༇༤༺༇༶༰༽ༀ༺༙༁༺༁༴༚༑༃༊༕༷༰༮༢༗༩༴༭༮༹༙༈༂༲༉༵༤༘༢༥༶༫༄༧༵ༀ༜༪༦༡༇༤༮༒༼༬༣༛༑༢༪༲༈༱ༀ༺༉༆༸༔༓༰༨༶༘༊༧༊༕༐༪

properties.name: Bafordgeton Monolith
properties.legend:
An ancient monolith. It has an inscription, but no one can translate it:
༠༯༒༪༓༳༪༫༽༰༵༚༬༠༨༖༗༦༖༯༆༂༪༰༛༻༵༪༡༲༈༣༵༯༷༔༘༯༫༯

properties.name: Rotham Runestone
properties.legend:
An ancient runestone. It has an inscription, but no one can translate it:
ሐወሠገከተሐ ቀጸ ሀሐጸዘደየቀጠለአነደወጸረፈኀጸመሠመኀበቀጠጸደከነለጸደተነደኀደለጸአፐተ ጠነተጠቀዐለኀተከሰ

properties.name: Kingtonver Megalith
properties.legend:
An ancient megalith. It has an inscription, but no one can translate it:
Ⲷ⳩ⳃⳔⲸⳁ⳧ⳁ⳧ⳒⳫⳞⳎ⳪⳹ⳔⲲⲺⳎⳒⳞⳒⳖⳢⲲⳒⳤ ⳂⲶⳊⳜⳃⳌⳖⳤⲺ ⲼⳫⳲⳜⳭ

properties.name: Ruined Fortress
properties.legend: Ruins of an ancient fortress. Untold riches may lie within.

properties.name: Sanyolpyo Library
properties.legend: A vast collection of knowledge, including many rare and ancient tomes.

properties.name: Mooses migration
properties.legend: A huge group of mooses are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Scorpions migration
properties.legend: A huge group of scorpions are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Rats migration
properties.legend: A huge group of rats are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Mantises migration
properties.legend: A huge group of mantises are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Bisons migration
properties.legend: A huge group of bisons are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Ibises migration
properties.legend: A huge group of ibises are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Badgers migration
properties.legend: A huge group of badgers are migrating, whether part of their annual routine, or something more extraordinary.

properties.name: Mermingra Crypt
properties.legend: Rising from the desolate landscape, this sinister necropolis is a testament to necromantic power. Its skeletal spires cast ominous shadows, concealing forbidden knowledge and arcane secrets.

properties.name: Malworthes Graveyard
properties.legend: This ethereal necropolis seems suspended between the realms of the living and the dead. Wisps of mist dance around the tombstones, while haunting melodies linger in the air, commemorating the departed.

properties.name: Wodbury Mausoleum
properties.legend: A desolate necropolis where an eerie stillness reigns. Time seems frozen amidst the decaying mausoleums, and the silence is broken only by the whispers of the wind and the rustle of tattered banners.

properties.name: Blandhurst Sepulchre
properties.legend: A towering necropolis adorned with macabre sculptures and guarded by formidable undead sentinels. Its ancient halls house the remains of fallen heroes, entombed alongside their cherished relics.

properties.name: Kingmoney Necropolis
properties.legend: A foreboding necropolis perched atop a jagged cliff, overlooking a desolate wasteland. Its towering walls harbor restless spirits, and the imposing gates bear the marks of countless battles and ancient curses.

properties.name: Berham Sepulchre
properties.legend: A sprawling necropolis built within a labyrinthine network of catacombs. Its halls are lined with countless alcoves, each housing the remains of the departed, while the distant sound of rattling bones fills the air.

properties.name: Matesin Graveyard
properties.legend: A labyrinthine necropolis where each step echoes with haunting murmurs. The walls are adorned with ancient runes, and restless spirits guide or hinder those who dare to delve into its depths.

properties.name: Random encounter
properties.legend: You have encountered a character.
